title: aram urf
body: Any thoughts about how enjoyable would aram urf be fun

replies.body:
all for urf would be cooler imo.

all for one but in urf mode

5 Garens chasing you down with spin to win activated.
5 Karthuses  spamming R with maximum magic pen
5 Leonas forever stunning you until you eventually die
5 Malphites ramming your  ass at once with their ult


*shudder*

I love it.

I disagree, but I do wish a random champion select between 5 choices would be funner because you could play champs you can't play while still having choice but not so much you never play a lot of champs.
It would be an unmitigated clusterfuck every single game, but worth a try at least once, right? How bad could it be...
